casebody.data:
ELI GLOBAL, LLC, et al.
v.
HEAVNER 12PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 3, 2017 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Kendal B. Reed, Attorney at Law, for Eli Global, LLC, et al. James H. Hughes, Attorney at Law, Richard M. Hutson, II, Attorney at Law, Durham, Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., Attorney *515at Law, Hampton Y. Dellinger, Attorney at Law, for Heavner, James A.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 31st of March 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of April 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 17th day of May 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
